T03kamvchtu:128: adhimātrakaruṇayā jagadarthakaraṇāya lokadhātuṣu viharaṇāt sarvakālaṃ bhagavataḥ pādāntike 'niṣīdanācca paścāduktāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:136: kālaniyatatvaṃ tu asminneva kāle piṇḍapāto grahītavya iti,
T03kamvchtu:137: tadapi kimiti aparijñānāt tadarthaṃ pūrvāhṇaḥ iti vacanenābhidhīyate /
T03kamvchtu:139: upavasatāṃ pravajitānāṃ ca piṇḍakālopalambhena pūrvāhṇalakṣaṇaṃ bhagavatā deśitamekāntenetyavabodhanārthaṃ kālasamaye ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:141: bhagavatā svecchayā kṛtamiti sambhāvyamānatvād etat padatrayamuktamiti vā /
T03kamvchtu:144: anyathā svasyaiva vineyatvābhāve kathaṃ parasya vineyatā syāt /
T03kamvchtu:154: vividhavismayahetūnāmanavarataṃ pradarśanena bhagavati ca pareṣāṃ prasādotpādanārthaṃ ityetānyaparimitāni prayojanānyavagantavyāni /
T03kamvchtu:155: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ iti yaḥ khalu bhojanādibhaktakṛtyaṃ sampāditavān,
T03kamvchtu:157: alpakuśalamūlebhyo nirjātā api brahmādayaḥ kavalīkārāhāravināgānnaiva bhaktakṛtyaṃ kurvanti,
T03kamvchtu:160: tathā āryadharmasaṃgītau api bhāṣitam “tathāgatastu kṣutpipāsāvarjitaḥ mūtrapurīṣavirahito 'kṣīṇakāyaśca bhavati” iti /
T03kamvchtu:161: satyamevaitat tathāpi yadi bhagavataḥ sa kāyo na paramārthabhūtaḥ,

T03kamvchtu:167: ye dāyakā dānapatayaḥ teṣu piṇḍaparikarmaprakāśanena praharṣaḥ samupajāyate /
T03kamvchtu:168: bhāgyavanto 'pi kiñcitkarmāvaraṇavaśāt pretādiṣu samupajātāḥ mahaujaskā yakṣādayaḥ
T03kamvchtu:169: bhagavatāṃ karanakhāmṛtena saṃspṛsṭaṃ paramākṣayadivyarasamādāya paribhuñjānāḥ paramasukhasaṃtṛptacetasa
T03kamvchtu:174: sarvamādāya tadanu yat piṇḍapātaṃ bhaktaṃ tat paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātam /
T03kamvchtu:178: athavā paścāditi yad dvitīyavāramādānaṃ tat paścādbhaktam /
T03kamvchtu:180: athavā apārahṇabhaktatvena yaḥ paribhujyate piṇḍaḥ sa evamucyate /
T03kamvchtu:181: ataśca dhūtaguṇavattvāt vikālabhojanaparihṛtatvācca tadviorahitametad bhaktaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:184: kintu pravrajitāstu svayamevānutiṣṭhanta iti nidarśayituṃ bhagavatā svayaṃ pātracīvarapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ kṛtam,
T03kamvchtu:187: kriyāntrādyadhimuktasattvāśayānuvartanaṃ vā sarajaskapādābhyāṃ śayanāsanānāmanavamardanam iti śikṣāyāmādaraṃ darśayituṃ pādaprakṣālanaṃ draṣṭavyam
T03kamvchtu:192: samāhitaireva dharmo 'yaṃ jñātuṃ śrotuṃ vā śakyate nānyairiti samādhau yatnotpādāya lokāanāṃ pravartanāt /
T03kamvchtu:193: pratimukhīṃ smṛtimupasthāpya iti pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ tāvad anuttarapadaṃ
T03kamvchtu:194: prāpya yathā buddhavaṃśānupacchedaḥ syāttathāhaṃ kariṣye iti yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ
T03kamvchtu:196: bhagavāṃstu buddhaḥ sadā samāhitaḥ sannapi sarvathā smṛtau viharati /
T03kamvchtu:199: samaye smareṇanāpi bhagavataḥ sadā samāhitatvaṃ na virudhyate /
T03kamvchtu:200: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ ityanena kimuktam?
T03kamvchtu:201: yatparimāṇena bhikṣusaṃghena saha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma,
T03kamvchtu:202: sa sarvaḥ dharmadeśanākāle tatra naiva sannipatitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:207: loke prāyaḥ samānyapūrvakaṃ viśeṣaḥ sthāpyata iti lokaprasiddhyanurūpamubhayamāha /
T03kamvchtu:215: samyag gata iti suṣṭhurūpeṇa gataḥ sugataḥ surūpavaditi /
T03kamvchtu:222: rājādayo 'pi āśritān prajādīn yathāśakti anuparigṛhṇanti kintvatra bhagavati āścaryamityāśaṅkākāyāṃ kimāścaryamiti tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:224: athavā yathā pūrvakā nairātmyadva rgeṇa gatāḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇamadhigatāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:232: bhagavatastāvat tathāgatatvenārhattvena samyagabhisambuddhya adhigatāśeṣasampattitayā yo 'nugrahaḥ sa khalvatra āścaryamityādarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:233: ṛte karuṇāṃ bhagavato 'nugrahe 'smin nāsti kiñcidanugrahakāraṇāntaramityanenābhihita eva bhavati bhagavān mahākāruṇikaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:234: anuparigṛhītāḥ iti abhisambuddhena bhagavatā dharmacakrapravartanākāle paripakvakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā bhūmiṣvavatāritāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:236: parīnditāḥ iti aparipakvakuśalamūlānām ādikarmikāṇāmanugrahāya ta eva parīnditāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:266: tatra prajñāpāramiteyaṃ kathaṃ buddhavaṃśasya anupacchedaṃ karotīti sandehakāriṇāṃ saṃśayopacchedanārtham /
T03kamvchtu:283: vikṣepanigrahastāvat samādhito vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepebhyo nivārya tatraiva viniyojanam /
T03kamvchtu:290: suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru samyaktayā udgrahītumudyukto bhava ityarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:296: athavā ahaṃ tu kevalaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tvameva tāvad yatnataḥ pratipadyasvetyarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:299: tacca daśabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ daśabhiśca bhūmibhiḥ parigṛhyate /
T03kamvchtu:302: bodhisaṃprasthitena ityetāvaducyamāne bodhīnāṃ tritvādanyasyā api bodheravagamaḥ syāditi /
T03kamvchtu:322: aho, ārabdhavīryo 'yamiti pareṇa jñāyamāne sati śraddhāmāgamya lābhasatkārādhyavasitatvam /
T03kamvchtu:323: tasmād bodhisattva etebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vimucya prajahyāt /
T03kamvchtu:331: yatra bodhisattvena sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyaṃ cittaṃ ca pragrahītavyamiti /
T03kamvchtu:336: sarvasattvaparinirvāpaṇacittamutpādya pāramitāyogī tāvat tathāgatasya rūpakāya-dharmakāyaprāptau chandamutpādayati /

T03kamvchtu:348: athāpi sattvaḥ sattva iti yastatsvabhāvaḥ taditaravyāvṛttaśabdādhyāropitārthasabhāgarūpeṇa khyātaḥ sa eva sattvena saṃgṛhyate /
T03kamvchtu:351: evaṃ sāmānyato nirūpya viśeṣato darśayitumāha- aṇḍajāḥ ityādi /
T03kamvchtu:358: bṛhatphalasyaikadeśaṃ bhavāgrajāṃścaṃ sattvān vihāya sarve sattvāḥ saṃjñinaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:367: atra sattvadhāturiti sāṃvṛte satye sattvadhātustaṃ darśayituṃ yāvān ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:376: praṇītaphale saṃvidyamāne kṛpālūnāṃ hīnaphalārthitā na khalu yuktimatī /
T03kamvchtu:377: saṃvidyamāne 'pi praṇītaphale prāptumaśakyatvādevaṃ prārthyata iti cet?
T03kamvchtu:378: tvanmatānusāraṃ tāvad trividhagotratvādagotratvācca sarvaiḥ hīnaphalamapi prāptuṃ naiva śakyate /
T03kamvchtu:381: saṃvidyamāneṣvapareṣu parārthakāriṣu buddhabodhisattveṣu nirarthakena mayātra praṇidhānena
T03kamvchtu:382: kimiti vicārān santyajya parapratyayatāṃ ca dūrīkṛtya mahākaruṇārdraḥ jājvalyamānena
T03kamvchtu:383: duḥkhāgninā pīḍyamānaṃ jagad vilokya ahameva tārayiṣyāmīti cintayamānaḥ praṇidadhāti / yathoktam-
T03kamvchtu:387: tathāpi priyaputrasya nṛpatvāya praṇidhānamiva satyapyaprāpye praṇītaphale kathanna praṇidhānamiti /
T03kamvchtu:404: nikhilasattvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇāśayena anena ādāryaṃ tāvad bodhicittasyādarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:407: kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti taddeśayitumāha evam ityādi /

T03kamvchtu:412: tena vikṣepanigraheṇa kathamatra cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityādarśayitumāha- tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:414: atha yaḥ pudgalādisaṃjñayā pravartate kiṃ sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ?
T03kamvchtu:415: sattva ityuktau punaḥ kasya hetoḥ iti praśnenetarābhirapi (saṃjñābhiḥ)
T03kamvchtu:417: asyāyamabhiprāyaḥ- kumatibhistāvat pañcaskandhātiriktaḥ antarvyāpāravāṃścaturṇāṃ bhogānāṃ bhoktā ekaḥ puruṣa iti parikalpyate sattvaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:419: ye cānirvacanīyatvena pudgalamicchanti tairapi tasya skandhasvabhāvavilakṣaṇatvenābhyugatatvāt tadbalenārthāntara evābhyupeyate /
T03kamvchtu:422: tatsādhakapraṇābhāvād bādhakasadbhāvācca taddraṣṭā bodhisattvo viparītābhiniveśena viparyasta eva bhavati /
T03kamvchtu:423: yaḥ khalu viparyastaḥ sa kathaṃ paramārthabodhisattvaḥ?
T03kamvchtu:426: tāvat prasiddhe nairātmyavādināṃ yuṣmākaṃ mate tu yastadādhāra ekaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa
T03kamvchtu:430: devadattaḥ muktaścānyo yajñadatta iti naiva vyavasthā,
T03kamvchtu:431: na cānyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalamityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:433: tathā hi- kartṛtvena prajñapto yo hi vijñānakṣaṇaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:435: akartuścaiva tasya phalena yogādakṛtābhyāgamo doṣaḥ syāt /
T03kamvchtu:436: smṛtyādikaṃ a bhinnādhikaraṇakamiti na loke pratītam /
T03kamvchtu:439: devadattasya cittānubhavaḥ yajñadattacittena na smaryate vā pratyabhijñāyate vā /
T03kamvchtu:440: yenānubhūyate tenaiva smaryate pratyabhijñāyate veti prasiddham /
T03kamvchtu:446: tatra yadi svatantrasyaikasya paramārthasato nityasya puruṣasyādhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyate,
T03kamvchtu:447: tadā tathāvidhena puruṣeṇa saha kvāpi hetoḥ sambandhāsiddheranaikāntikatvam,
T03kamvchtu:454: api ca, yadā yatra santāne 'vidyādikaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ pravartate,
T03kamvchtu:456: sa eva punaḥ śrutamayādikrameṇāryamārgotpādād avidyādinirodhenāśrayaparāvṛttau muktaḥ ityupacaryate /
T03kamvchtu:457: ubhāvapi tau bandhamokṣau nityaikaparamārthavastuviṣayakau natarāṃ siddhau /
T03kamvchtu:459: yasmin santāne śubhoo vā aśubho vā cittānubhavaḥ samutpadyate,
T03kamvchtu:460: tasminneva kālāntare santatiparipākamāgamya mastuluṅgalākṣādirasāvasiktasantatiparipāka iva sukha-duḥkha-smṛtyādiphalodayo dṛṣṭāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:462: naiva khalu kaścidekaḥ kartā bhoktā smartā vā /
T03kamvchtu:466: tataśca yeṣu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratiniyataḥ teṣu naiva kaścid eko 'nugataḥ bhinnāvasthaśca paridṛśyate /
T03kamvchtu:472: anyathā tayorubhayorapyavasthayoranupapannatve parasparokārakatvābhāve vā ākāśamiva kathaṃ tāvat tāvat sidhyet bhoktrādiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:474: itthaṃ pratiniyatātmanā sambandhena sukhādīnāṃ sambhavaḥ na tu sarvatra /
T03kamvchtu:479: tathāpi pratyaviṣayatvād ahaṃbuddheḥ pratyakṣata evātmā sidhyatīti cet?
T03kamvchtu:482: ahaṃbuddhau pratīyamānatve yathā khalu pratyakṣa eko nityo vibhuścātmā svasiddhāntairukalpyate tathā naivopalabhyata ityavaśyameva draṣṭavyam
T03kamvchtu:483: anyathā ahaṃbuddheryadi pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt tadā vivādamāneṣu tāvannaiva pravarteta ātmaviṣaye kaścana vivādaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:487: anādikālābhyāsavaśāt pratinīyateṣu rūpādiskandheṣu ekatvamadhyāropya paraṃ vyāvarttīyatumahamiti pratītiḥ,
T03kamvchtu:490: kathaṃ tarhi mama deha iti bhedamātragrahaṇamiti cet?
T03kamvchtu:493: kathaṃ tarhi mama ātmā iti cintyate /
T03kamvchtu:494: atha vastuto 'bhinne 'pi bhedāntaraparihāreṇa tanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ śilāputrakasya śarīravad bhedopacāreṇa grahaṇānnāsti virodha iti cet?
T03kamvchtu:496: ātmā khalu viṣayaḥ punaḥ kramotpattyā virudhyata iti paścāt vakṣyate /
T03kamvchtu:497: na kevalamātmagraha ātmā apitu tadviṣayo rūpādirātmāstītyapi vaktuṃ na śakyate,
T03kamvchtu:506: nāsti pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca vyatiricya pramāṇamityanyatra vicāritam /
T03kamvchtu:507: bādhakapramāṇaṃ tāvannirākriyate- yadyevamātmā skandhebhyo 'bhinnastadā skandhavat kṣāṇikaḥ syād athavā skandhāḥ khalvātmavannityāḥ syuḥ,
T03kamvchtu:512: atha skandhebhyo bhinna ātmā iṣyate tadā sukhādināsambaddhatve na sidhyet tasya bhoktṛtvādikam /
T03kamvchtu:513: tatra prayogaḥ- yo nāsti sukhaduḥkhādibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ sa nāsti kartā vā bhoktā vā,
T03kamvchtu:516: ātmāpi tathārthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:518: tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam /
T03kamvchtu:521: tathā hi- adhaḥprasarpaṇadharmiṇāṃ jalādīnāmadhogamanapratibandhakatvena vyavasthāpyate tāvadādhāraḥ /
T03kamvchtu:528: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:533: anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam /
T03kamvchtu:539: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:541: api ca, saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet,
T03kamvchtu:544: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā /
T03kamvchtu:545: adarśane 'pi balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat saṃyogaparikalpanayā,
T03kamvchtu:547: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati
T03kamvchtu:548: kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:551: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:555: duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
T03kamvchtu:558: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti
T03kamvchtu:559: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā?
T03kamvchtu:560: atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā?
T03kamvchtu:565: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā,
T03kamvchtu:580: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo 'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti
T03kamvchtu:585: iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:587: tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ /
T03kamvchtu:593: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran,
T03kamvchtu:595: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo 'yamuktapūrva eva /
T03kamvchtu:602: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi /
T03kamvchtu:605: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram /
T03kamvchtu:611: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet /
T03kamvchtu:614: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:617: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:618: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:624: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:626: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:627: tatra tāvanna sākāreṇa citravarṇādidarśanakāle ekajñānābhinnatvādākāraṇāmapyekatvaṃ prasajyeta,
T03kamvchtu:633: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayāpi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo 'pi na sambhavati,
T03kamvchtu:635: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā /
T03kamvchtu:636: tatra na tāvat sarvātmanā- arthajjñānasyāpi jaḍasvabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
T03kamvchtu:640: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:641: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:657: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ /
T03kamvchtu:664: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:665: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt /
T03kamvchtu:668: evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati,
T03kamvchtu:669: tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato 'rthaḥ sidhyati,
T03kamvchtu:671: apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ /
T03kamvchtu:676: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
T03kamvchtu:681: na, tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha tasya kasyacidapi sambandhasyāsiddhatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:686: parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate /
T03kamvchtu:694: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
T03kamvchtu:696: ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam,
T03kamvchtu:707: tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
T03kamvchtu:709: tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran /
T03kamvchtu:716: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:720: sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:722: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti /
T03kamvchtu:723: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste 'vaśiṣyate,
T03kamvchtu:726: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
T03kamvchtu:732: tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti /
T03kamvchtu:739: ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā /
T03kamvchtu:745: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam /
T03kamvchtu:749: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet /
T03kamvchtu:750: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
T03kamvchtu:753: evaṃ dānādiṣu yathā yogastathā ādarśitaḥ, nānyatra /
T03kamvchtu:754: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam,
T03kamvchtu:755: tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā,
T03kamvchtu:761: tato vastuno 'bhāve 'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:762: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam /
T03kamvchtu:766: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte,
T03kamvchtu:771: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:780: prathamapakṣe kenāpi kasyacidapi deyasyābhāvāt puṇyābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
T03kamvchtu:782: bodhisattvaiḥ yo hi sattvārthaṃ śrama āsthitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:787: anyathā kathaṃ bhagavatārthijanebhyaḥ putrādayaḥ pradattā iti sarvāṇyetāni codyāni manasi nidhāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:790: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- samyagdṛṭivihitāni dānādīni suviśuddhatayā viśiṣṭeṣṭaphalāni abhinirvartayanti,
T03kamvchtu:800: ata eva anupalambhapratiṣṭhitāni dānādīni samyagdṛṣṭisambhūtānīti vipaścitsu prasādātiśayaṃ janayanti, nānyeṣu /
T03kamvchtu:801: tataśca dānādiṣvapravṛttatayā puṇyābhāvo deyādīnāṃ caikāntābhāvo neṣyate,
T03kamvchtu:817: tadabhāvānna rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamiti bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatarūpakāyāptikāmanayā
T03kamvchtu:818: dānādiṣu kathaṃ pravarteteti cediti codyamāśaṅkaya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādinā
T03kamvchtu:821: lakṣaṇasampadā iti nimittamātrābhidhānena tathāgatasya nikhilo rūpakāyaḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtaḥ paridīpitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:822: tatra lakṣaṇāni tāvat cakrāṅkahastapādatādīni dvātriṃśat padabāhulyabhiyā nollikhyante,
T03kamvchtu:828: ata eva tathāvidhe rūpakāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdeśaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:829: athemāni lakṣaṇāni paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvāni vā tadārabdhāvayavirūpāṇi vā bhaveyuriti?
T03kamvchtu:836: etad vicintya subhūtirāha no hīdam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
T03kamvchtu:837: yadi lakṣaṇāni mṛṣā bhaveyustarhi kathaṃ bhagavatā tattatsūtreṣu lakṣaṇāni samupadiṣṭānīti cintayan tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭvaivaṃ saivālakṣaṇasampad ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:861: tatrānāgate puruṣeṣu pañcakaṣāyāṇāmādhikyādevaṃvidhadharmaratnasya atyantagambhīrodāraphalatvāt pravacanadharmakāye 'nāptatvāśaṅkayā asti iti pṛṣṭavān /
T03kamvchtu:862: asti iti padaṃ tu kecit sattvāḥ ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti ityarthapadena yojyam /
T03kamvchtu:863: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyām ityatra śatānāṃ pañcakaṃ pañcaśatī,
T03kamvchtu:878: arthato 'viparyayastasaṃjñaivātra bhūtasaṃjñetyabhidhīyate na tu śabdābhiniveśamātram 'ayaṃ bhūtaḥ'; iti saṃjñā /
T03kamvchtu:881: pratyakṣavad dṛṣṭavā bhagavān sūbhūtisaśayaṃ parihartuṃ bhaviṣyanti ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:886: yathā vā bhūtasaṃjñayā saṃjñitāstān bhagavān paridīpitaṃvān /
T03kamvchtu:887: śīlavantaḥ guṇavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca ityanena tu kramaśo 'dhiśīlādhicittādhiprajñāśceti śikṣātrayapratiprattisamanvitāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:890: kleśavati paścimakāle tu kathaṃ tathāvidhaśīlādiguṇavanto bhaviṣyantīti cintayitvā sūbhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:893: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ tāvadavavādamanuśāsanīṃ ca śirasādāya śīlādiguṇasampadbhyaḥ prayatnavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:894: teṣāṃ tato 'pi bahutaraṃ puṇyamabhidhātuṃ anekabuddhaśatasahasraḥ ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:901: anyathā sarveṣāṃ jñānāt jñānāt sarvajño bhagavāniti deśanayā ko viśeṣo darśito bhavet,
T03kamvchtu:902: athavā tatteṣāṃ bhavyatvaṃ yat tatpramukhaṃ kṛtvā deśanā pravartitetyavagantavyam /
T03kamvchtu:904: atasteṣāmaśeṣaṃ puṇyaskandhasaṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ sarve te sattvāḥ ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:907: ebhiḥ sarvairabhūtasaṃjñāṃ nirākṛtya bhūtasaṃgyotpādane chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitaṃ tathā sthānasyāsyaudāryamapi paridīpitam
T03kamvchtu:909: te anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyanta iti jñāpakahetau paripṛṣṭe 'tra teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:910: anena tavat yogasamāpattau kathaṃ pratittavyamityetat prakāśitam,
T03kamvchtu:916: yadi nāsti ātmādisaṃjñā tarhi kiṃ śrāvakādivad asti rūpādidharmasaṃjñā?
T03kamvchtu:920: iti cintāyāṃ evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:921: saṃvṛtau avicāraramaṇīyatayā dharmāṇāṃ sadbhāvāt saṃvṛtipathasthitebhyastāvad adharmasaṃjñā naiva yuktimatī,
T03kamvchtu:923: tanniṣedhānna kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrādharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
T03kamvchtu:926: tadyathā satye 'pi vijñaptimātre vijñaptimātrateyamiti vikalpayan na vijñaptimātratāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:928: yadyātmādīnāmasattvaṃ tadā tatra tatsaṃjñāyā apravṛtau satyāṃ 'ātmaiva rūpamidam';
T03kamvchtu:929: ityādikaṃ nāmamātramiti nāmābhiniveśasaṃjñā teṣāṃ bhavediti matvā saṃjñāpi ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:933: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sarvasaṃjñāvigamād mṛta-nirodhasamāpannapudgalavad yogino 'bhāva eva syāditi nāpi..... nāaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam
T03kamvchtu:938: yad yogijñānaṃ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tat kenāvagamyata iti cet?
T03kamvchtu:946: niḥsvabhāvatāvicāreṇa tadgocarībhūtānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyena nairātmasaṅgrahāt yā khalu vyavasthā saiva yugapadulambhanam /
T03kamvchtu:951: tasmāt sati nairātmyadvayāvabodhe teṣāmanekaśatasahasrabuddhānāṃ paryupāsanaṃ pratīyate /
T03kamvchtu:953: sa tu saṃsāre na ucito bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:954: anayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kīdṛśyā ca bhūtasaṃjñayā tat saṃjñātavyamiti saṃdarśitaṃ tadgāmbhīryamityapi ca paridīpitam /
T03kamvchtu:955: ātmādīnāmasattve teṣāmātmādisaṃjñāyā abhāvāt padasamudāyādibhiḥ ātmatva sūktaṃ duraktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñaṃ kiṃ teṣu niyamena na
T03kamvchtu:956: naivam, yadi bodhisattvānā na bhavet tatra saṃjñā, (tarhi)
T03kamvchtu:957: ayuktayupapannatīrthakaradharmān parityajya bhagavaddeśiteṣu dharmeṣu tadadhigamāya kathaṃ chanda utpādanīya ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:959: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- ekānekasvabhāvavicāreṇa yathā rūpādilakṣaṇadharmā na saṃvidyante,
T03kamvchtu:961: yatra dharmasaṃjñā tatrātmādisaṃjñā api niścayena naiva prahīṇā,
T03kamvchtu:964: tasyā eva manasikārarūpatvāt maitrīprabhṛtiṣu tattvamanasikārāsadbhāve nātmadṛṣṭiḥ parihīyate /
T03kamvchtu:967: api ca, bodhisattvānāṃ sā dharmasaṃjñā yadyavaśyamanutpannadarśanamārgaḥ syāt tathā sati tena kathamātmādisaṃjñā prahīṇā syāt?
T03kamvchtu:969: ataḥ sarvametat parīkṣya sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:971: anyathā tayorbhinnākāratvāt kathaṃ dharmasaṃjñaiva ātmagrāhaḥ syāditi /
T03kamvchtu:973: evaṃ sati tattatsūtreṣu kathaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ parigrāhayiṣyate?
T03kamvchtu:979: abhipretasiddhyarthaṃ kolopamadeśitasya lakṣaṇasya na grahaṇaniṣedha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:980: tasmāt ityādinā sa evārthaḥ padāntarai prayuktaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:981: yato hi sarvo dharmo 'dharmaśca satya ityabhiniveśasya viparītābhiniveśatvād,
T03kamvchtu:982: yuktyopapanno ya āgamasamūhaḥ saṃsārārṇavottaraṇāya proktaḥ kolopamaḥ sa (yadā)
T03kamvchtu:983: pāraṃ gatvā niṣprayojanatvāt parityājyo bhavati, kimu (tadā)
T03kamvchtu:986: anyathā dharmādharmādikaṃ yadi satyasvabhāvaṃ syāt tadā paramārthaviṣayatvāt tadabhiniveśasya saṃsārapāragateṣvapi yuktisahaṃ (Vajraṭ_137)
T03kamvchtu:998: tena prasiddhaviruddhāḥ adharmalakṣaṇāḥ paraparikalpitā ātmādayaśca upadiṣṭāste 'pi saṃgṛhyante /
T03kamvchtu:1000: anena tāvad vikṣepaṃ nīgṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetad darśitam /
T03kamvchtu:1004: tadā abhisambuddho bhūtvā 'bhagavatā sarve dharmā deśitāḥ';
T03kamvchtu:1006: ata eva bodhisattvaiḥ tathāgatajñānahetumadhigamadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chando na janayitavyaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1007: ityetad vicārya jñānahetudharmakāyāvāptaye chandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityaktam /
T03kamvchtu:1008: anenārthataḥ paramārthastu anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti abhisambuddha ityetayoḥ (Vajraṭ_138)
T03kamvchtu:1010: tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tu tathāgatasya jñānahetuṃ jñānadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca pradarśite /
T03kamvchtu:1011: anuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhādīnāṃ pratipattibhedena bhinnaḥ jñānahetuko 'dhigamakāyastāvannirdiśyate
T03kamvchtu:1014: saṃvṛtisvabhāvastvevam- sambodhiḥ samboddhavyaṃ deśanā deśitavyamityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1016: taduktābhiprāyaṃ saṃgṛhya āryasubhūtisthaviraḥ yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi ityetadavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1019: dharmadeśanā ca na sta iti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
T03kamvchtu:1020: agrāhyaḥ iti paramārthastāvannirvikalpajñānagocaro 'pi na bhavatīti uktapūrvam /
T03kamvchtu:1026: nanu syuḥ sarve bhāvā agrāhyāḥ anabhilāpyāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1027: tathāpi svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt paramārthataḥ dharmasvabhāvatāsthitā evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1028: sarvabhāvānāṃ paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parinirvṛttatvānna sambhavati svalakṣaṇadhārakatvam /
T03kamvchtu:1029: yadyevaṃ tarhi bhagavatā abhāvo 'bhisambuddho draṣṭavya iti vicārya nādharmaḥ ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:1030: sa tu prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvaḥ anena tāvat yogasamāpattiṃ nirdiśya adhyāropo 'pavādāntaśca nirastau /
T03kamvchtu:1042: abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
T03kamvchtu:1056: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate /
T03kamvchtu:1057: ata eva āryasandhinirmocanasūtre uktam- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; iti /
T03kamvchtu:1064: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat /
T03kamvchtu:1068: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:1069: ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca /
T03kamvchtu:1074: yadi bhagavato 'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1075: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe 'nupravartitavyamiti
T03kamvchtu:1076: vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:1082: tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1096: prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati /
T03kamvchtu:1098: bhāvānāṃ sthiratvena abhisaṃskāreṇa apravṛttatvāt cittamapi prajñaptisanmātrameva /
T03kamvchtu:1099: ekānekasvabhāvena pratisvaṃ parīkṣāyāṃ mithyaiva tāvat svabhāvaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1100: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate /
T03kamvchtu:1113: tena ca bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti āvedituṃ bhagavatā yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyuktam /
T03kamvchtu:1115: puṇyahetukādhigamakāyasya pravacanakāyato nirjātatvāt tataścatuṣpādikāyāmapi gāthāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ (yadā)
T03kamvchtu:1117: tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate /
T03kamvchtu:1120: etena paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāḥ abhisambuddhasya cāpyasattve saṃvṛtau tāvat puṇyakāyadeśanāyāḥ sattvāt bodhisattvaiḥ puṇyamadhigāntuṃ pravartayitavyamevetyabhiprāyaḥ
T03kamvchtu:1123: ṣaṭpādikāyā gāthāyāḥ sattve 'pi catuṣpādikā iti viśeṣīkṛtā /
T03kamvchtu:1133: kimiti śraddheyamātramuta yuktito 'vagamyamiti manasi kṛtvā tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1134: iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
T03kamvchtu:1136: evaṃ (Vajraṭ_143) bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
T03kamvchtu:1138: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati /
T03kamvchtu:1141: dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam?
T03kamvchtu:1142: yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1143: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo 'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate,
T03kamvchtu:1145: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1148: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti /
T03kamvchtu:1149: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti (Vajraṭ_144)
T03kamvchtu:1150: vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1151: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
T03kamvchtu:1152: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti?
T03kamvchtu:1153: na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto?
T03kamvchtu:1156: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1158: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1160: saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
T03kamvchtu:1162: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
T03kamvchtu:1165: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno 'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1167: prajñaptyā ca pravacanasvabhāvo dharmakāya iti ced?
T03kamvchtu:1168: tathā sati rūpakāyo 'pi tatprāpteranurūpahetutvāt tatprāpakahetutvācca dharmakāyaḥ syāditi /
T03kamvchtu:1170: bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ dharmakāyastu pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,
T03kamvchtu:1173: na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanāpi /
T03kamvchtu:1177: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1179: prajñaptita ityucyamāne 'pi na rūpakāyo dharmakāyatvena prasakto bhavati,
T03kamvchtu:1182: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate /
T03kamvchtu:1187: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno 'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena /
T03kamvchtu:1188: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate /
T03kamvchtu:1190: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni /
T03kamvchtu:1205: tatra bhagavatā dharmapudgalayorvistareṇa nairātmye deśite 'pi anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā
T03kamvchtu:1207: evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle 'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo 'bhavam,
T03kamvchtu:1208: '; yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt /
T03kamvchtu:1209: (ataḥ) sattvasaṃjñādivirahasya naivamabhiprāya iti vighnabhūtābhimānavisaṃyogārthaṃ pañcamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi
T03kamvchtu:1210: asyāyamatra sāmānyato 'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1211: teṣāmapi ahantvena mamatvena cābhiniveśo na bhavati,
T03kamvchtu:1213: tasmin kāle 'ham..... ityādi yattallokena saha vyavahāraprajñaptyarthaṃ parasantānavyavacchedamātrajñāpanārthaṃ vā,
T03kamvchtu:1217: tattvajñānasthitaiḥ na śakyate tāvallokena saha vyavahartum /
T03kamvchtu:1222: tasya ca kartari karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ cābhiniveśaprahāṇena idampratyayatādhigamānnairātmyādhigamo darśitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1226: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate /
T03kamvchtu:1227: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā prāptam ityanena apalakṣaṇamātrapradarśanena sarveṣāmabhimānānāṃ praheyatvaṃ pradarśaye /
T03kamvchtu:1229: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato 'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ)
T03kamvchtu:1240: sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate /
T03kamvchtu:1241: yasmin santāne nairātmyamārgalakṣaṇahetusannihitatayā kleśamutpādātyantaviruddhāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ phalamutpadyata iti phalaṃ prāptyata ityevamucyate,
T03kamvchtu:1243: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt /
T03kamvchtu:1244: tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayorapi sthitatvāt,
T03kamvchtu:1258: idaṃ prāpyamidañca prāpakamiti niścayo na bhavatī /
T03kamvchtu:1260: teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate,
T03kamvchtu:1263: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne 'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:1270: śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā nirdiśyante /
T03kamvchtu:1275: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1279: sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1284: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1293: na hi sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhannāma prahīṇatathāvidhakleśāvaraṇajñānasantatau upacaritatvāt,
T03kamvchtu:1294: santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1297: padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi';
T03kamvchtu:1300: atra cobhatobhāgavimuktatvamarhattvamālambya taditareṣu raṇā notpādyanta iti vicintya yogaḥ samāpadyate /
T03kamvchtu:1301: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1304: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham,
T03kamvchtu:1306: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1307: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo 'sthitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1310: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1311: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena,
T03kamvchtu:1316: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1317: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1320: teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid
T03kamvchtu:1321: dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti /
T03kamvchtu:1322: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1323: nāsti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasya prāpyaprāpakatvena udgrahaṇaṃ nāma,
T03kamvchtu:1326: tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate,
T03kamvchtu:1328: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ';
T03kamvchtu:1334: ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau /
T03kamvchtu:1337: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ
T03kamvchtu:1342: bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1345: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho 'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te,
T03kamvchtu:1346: tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti /
T03kamvchtu:1350: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1352: kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra 'apratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam'; ityarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1354: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1357: hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāṃ prati chandaḥ praṇidhānamapi [na karttavyamityapi] nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:1358: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete /
T03kamvchtu:1359: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1362: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve 'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1365: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:1369: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1371: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti /
T03kamvchtu:1374: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena,
T03kamvchtu:1379: anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1380: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1381: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt?
T03kamvchtu:1384: tato 'yamabhāvatvena deśitaḥ sumerumātraparimāṇo 'pi ya ātmabhāvo yadā niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti,
T03kamvchtu:1385: tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet?
T03kamvchtu:1386: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
T03kamvchtu:1388: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite /
T03kamvchtu:1389: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1391: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1392: (Vajraṭ_155) anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ paridīpyatepuṇyaparigrahaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1396: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti /
T03kamvchtu:1397: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti /
T03kamvchtu:1398: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti /
T03kamvchtu:1399: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti /
T03kamvchtu:1400: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitam- vastuviśeṣaḥ kṣetraviśeṣaśca /
T03kamvchtu:1404: praṇītastu loke dūrlabhatvena khyātaḥ yadāha saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā iti /
T03kamvchtu:1408: yathā vastutathatā tathā bhāṣitatvāt niruktyā tathā ukta iti kathyate /
T03kamvchtu:1416: tatra pūrvaṃ tāvat parasya phalam athavā aparaṃ tu pūrvasya vyākhyānam /
T03kamvchtu:1417: deśayet iti śabdaṃ samprakāśayet iti chandam adhimuktimutpādayedityarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1426: yadaivaṃ pudgalanairātmyagāthāmātropadeśenāpi caityabhūtyabhūto jāyate kiṃ khalu punaḥ nairātmyadvayopadeśena ityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1429: vācayiṣyanti iti pustakagatam paryavāpsyanti iti artham /
T03kamvchtu:1431: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā codgṛhītatvād yoniśaśca (manasi kariṣyanti) ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1438: sa eva sākṣād dharamāṇabuddha iveti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1439: guru iti mañjughoṣādyanyataraḥ kaścit tatkāryasādhanāya dharmabhāṇakaḥ sthānīyarūpeṇa draṣṭavyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1446: tasminnanurāgaṃ parityajya dharmaṃ pratipattuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca darśite /
T03kamvchtu:1447: ito dharmaparyāyād ityupalakṣaṇamātraparikīrtanena bāhyaśāstreṣvanurāgaṃ parivarjya sarvasaddharmān prati yatna āstheya iti paridīpitam /
T03kamvchtu:1448: acintyasāmarthyanvitatvādayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ nāmamātraśravaṇenāpi parānupakarotīti sattvānāṃ puṇyotpādakathanāya āryasubhūtiḥ ko nāma ayam iti pṛṣṭavān /
T03kamvchtu:1449: - (Vajraṭ_158) kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi ityanena asyodgrahaṇenāpyaprameyapuṇyaṃ bhavatīti paridīpyate /
T03kamvchtu:1450: prajñāpāramitā nāma iti yasyā tannāma tattathā ucyate /
T03kamvchtu:1453: prajñā ca sā pāramitā ceti samāsaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1456: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam /
T03kamvchtu:1463: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya
T03kamvchtu:1467: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā,
T03kamvchtu:1472: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā,
T03kamvchtu:1477: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate,
T03kamvchtu:1478: ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate /
T03kamvchtu:1480: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate,
T03kamvchtu:1482: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1483: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:1484: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā,
T03kamvchtu:1485: tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti /
T03kamvchtu:1490: ata eva ca paramārthataḥ 'nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ';
T03kamvchtu:1491: iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
T03kamvchtu:1492: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1493: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1496: tathāpi ye tāvad ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
T03kamvchtu:1498: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate /
T03kamvchtu:1500: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate /
T03kamvchtu:1504: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti /
T03kamvchtu:1507: te ca paramāṇavo 'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ, (tarhiṃ)
T03kamvchtu:1512: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo 'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva /
T03kamvchtu:1519: anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1523: evañcāntaśaḥ paramāṇūnāmapi yuktyā pratyekaṃ parikṣyamāṇānāṃ pratītāveva sattvāt pratīyate lokadhātūnāṃ cānekasvaviyuktatvam,
T03kamvchtu:1526: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo 'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1529: adhātuḥ saḥ iti ekānekasvabhāvarahitaḥ sa ityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1530: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1531: śeṣāścatvāraḥ skandhāstu yathaikānekasvabhāvena viyuktāstathā pūrvaṃ vivecitā eva /
T03kamvchtu:1532: evaṃ sati paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarve dharmā māyopamā dṛśyante yogibhiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1535: tatprahāṇārthaṃ ca chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
T03kamvchtu:1536: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau iti nimittamātrābhidhānena sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvabhāvanā sandarśitā /
T03kamvchtu:1537: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam /
T03kamvchtu:1538: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1540: samprati ye bodhisattvāḥ puṇyasambhārapratipattaye 'tyantamupakāritvād bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ)
T03kamvchtu:1543: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi /
T03kamvchtu:1552: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite /
T03kamvchtu:1557: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe 'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ
T03kamvchtu:1561: anena cāsāre 'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam,
T03kamvchtu:1565: tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe /
T03kamvchtu:1569: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam
T03kamvchtu:1570: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
T03kamvchtu:1575: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā naivaṃ śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1578: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1589: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta,
T03kamvchtu:1590: tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1596: ata eva nocyate bhūtasaṃjñeyaṃ bhūtasaṃjñātveneti darśitam,
T03kamvchtu:1597: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā,
T03kamvchtu:1600: kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
T03kamvchtu:1607: samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan,
T03kamvchtu:1612: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ- anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
T03kamvchtu:1614: mayyapyevaṃ sambhāvanāyāṃ saddharmotthānakāle 'pi yuṣmākametādṛśapratipattyabhāve idamatyantaṃ lajjāsthānaṃ tat syādityucyate /
T03kamvchtu:1617: bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā,
T03kamvchtu:1623: taccaivaṃ nirucyate- pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt
T03kamvchtu:1627: kalpeṣu asmin [dharme] dhāraṇādikrameṇa īdṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhigamya paryavāpsyanti te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
T03kamvchtu:1631: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:1633: pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1639: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1642: tasyā api parikṣākṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā /
T03kamvchtu:1644: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1652: tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam /
T03kamvchtu:1653: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate /
T03kamvchtu:1654: (Vajraṭ_167) evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam /
T03kamvchtu:1657: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1660: mahāyāne tu tadapi dharmamātraṃ mithyeti deśitam,
T03kamvchtu:1661: tasmād anādikālīnasahajātmadṛṣṭisamprayuktāntaḥkaraṇā abhāvitātmānaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ śrutvā nāstyahamiti trasiṣyanti /
T03kamvchtu:1666: iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:1669: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante,
T03kamvchtu:1671: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti /
T03kamvchtu:1672: '; śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
T03kamvchtu:1676: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā, (Vajraṭ_168)
T03kamvchtu:1677: api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam /
T03kamvchtu:1678: anena 'ekabuiddhena deśitamapi aviparītārthatvena gṛhyate sarvabuddhaikābhipretatve khalu kimucyatām';
T03kamvchtu:1683: anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate,
T03kamvchtu:1685: śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate /
T03kamvchtu:1688: evaṃ hrīsthāne deśite 'pi ye duḥkhe 'kṣāntyā vīryātiśayamārabdhuṃ notsahante,
T03kamvchtu:1689: teṣāṃ duḥkhākṣāntervyapagamārthaṃ trayodaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha apia tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādi /
T03kamvchtu:1697: ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:1705: evaṃ paramārthato 'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1706: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam /
T03kamvchtu:1707: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1708: iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha /
T03kamvchtu:1717: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet?
T03kamvchtu:1718: tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1720: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1733: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante // iti //
T03kamvchtu:1735: yena kṣāntibalena kaliṅgarājā eva sattvaḥ narakaṃ gamiṣyatītyabhipretam /
T03kamvchtu:1737: sati nirvikāratayā niyataṃ vyāpādādisambhavābhāvatayā ātmādisaṃjñāvyapagamahetutayā ca īdṛśyāḥ kṣānterjñānamādarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:1740: aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1741: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti /
T03kamvchtu:1742: tadevam, vineyajanāḥ 'yadā bhagavāneva bodhyarthamevaṃvidhāṃ parāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvitavān,
T03kamvchtu:1752: sā ca kṣāntiḥ dvividhā dīpitānirantaraparāpakāraduḥkhaviṣayikā parāpakārāsahyaduḥkhaviṣayikā ca /
T03kamvchtu:1762: bodhicittotpāde sati na kenāpi saṃsāraduḥkhena spṛṣṭo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1763: bodhicittotpāde 'pi ātmābhiniviṣṭatayā trividhaduḥkhasaṃjñābhiḥ santrasya kadācit punarnotpādaḥ syādataḥ sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:1765: rūpādyabhiniveśena śrāvakādivat saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tadduḥkhasantaptāḥ na kadācidapi bodhicittamutpādayanti,
T03kamvchtu:1767: rūpādiṣu satābhiniveśo hi tatra pratiṣṭhita iti pūrvavadatrāpyuktaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1773: na kvacit pratiṣṭhitam ityanena rūpādiṣu nāmamātrasattābhiniveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
T03kamvchtu:1776: yaduta asatāṃ vitathābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate?
T03kamvchtu:1777: iti cittotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:1780: atrāyamarthaḥ- anādikālastaccitaṃ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśabalena rūpādau pratiṣṭhitam,
T03kamvchtu:1782: sa tasya rūpādivastuno 'bhāvāt paramārthato na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:1783: tasmādeva ityanenopasaṃhāreṇātra dvitīye pakṣe pratisṭhitatvameva darśitaṃ bhavati /
T03kamvchtu:1785: dvitīyāsahyavastuna pratipakṣatvena api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1787: te 'pi sattvā yadi paramārthato na syuḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1789: kathaṃ te tathāvidheṣu mithyāpravṛtteṣu sattveṣu khinnā bhaveyuḥ (Vajraṭ_172)
T03kamvchtu:1791: tatra sattvaṃ saṃjñāṃ ca pratiṣidhya nairātmyadvayamudīritam /
T03kamvchtu:1794: evaṃ tāvad yuktyā kṣāntiryujyata iti nirdiśya sāmprataṃ tathāgate sampratyayo 'pi yujyata iti nirūpayan bhūtavādī ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1801: yathānye buddhā bhagavantaḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇāni prahīṇavantastathaiva tathāgato 'pyayaṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1805: tathāgata evāyamiti kathaṃ sidhyatītyāha- satyavādī iti /
T03kamvchtu:1809: atyantaparokṣārthastu sarvathā samyak kathayituṃ na śakyate, yathoktam-
T03kamvchtu:1811: ayaṃ satyavādī satyaṃ kena rūpeṇa jānātityāha- tathāvādī iti /
T03kamvchtu:1813: sa heyopādeyatattvaṃ sopāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathaiva bhāṣate 'taḥ sa kathaṃ na satyavādī syāditi /
T03kamvchtu:1814: evaṃbhūte 'pi taddeśitāni catvāri satyāni kiṃ tathaiva pratiṣṭhitānīti?
T03kamvchtu:1817: na pramāṇabādhitāni uktānyataḥ satyānītyarthaḥ etena samagreṇa kāryakāraṇena bhagavataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam /
T03kamvchtu:1820: ekasyāpi bhāvasvabhāvasya paramārthato 'siddhatvād ekamapi satyaṃ tāvad duḥsādhyam,
T03kamvchtu:1827: nirodhasya tvabhāvāt tatprāpako mārgo 'pi naiva paramārthataḥ,
T03kamvchtu:1829: tathoktam- 'bodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya ekasyāpi satyasya siddhirna dṛṣṭā,
T03kamvchtu:1832: etat pravicintya ye bhūtavādini śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāsteṣāmadhyāropāntaparihārārtham api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:1833: na tatra satyam iti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi svabhāvasyāsiddheḥ /

T03kamvchtu:2287: evaṃ sati kathaṃ prajñāsyete tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣurādividyamānatā cittadhārā ceti cittāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:2292: anyathā paramārthataḥ sarvavāggocarātītatvānna vaktuṃ śakṣyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2294: māṃsacakṣurādīnyapi cakṣuḥsvabhāvarahitānyeva uktānīti kathanaṃ prakṛtaṃ sākṣānnoktam /
T03kamvchtu:2295: atra kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamiti tadabhidhātumāha tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
T03kamvchtu:2301: yathā traikālikacittasya paramārthato 'bhāvastathā pūrvamuktaṃ vakṣyate ca /
T03kamvchtu:2307: yadi nāsti traikālikaṃ cittaṃ tadā puṇyaskandho 'pi na syāt,
T03kamvchtu:2309: tataḥ tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ sampādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvo yatnaṃ kūryāditi vicintya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2310: anena kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yo 'ntaśo ratnādikaṃ bāhyavastu tyajati, so 'pi (yadi)
T03kamvchtu:2312: kathaṃ na tathāgatasya asaṃkhyeyāprameyakalpeṣu duṣkarānekaśatānyabhyasyataḥ puṇyaskandhādhipatyaṃ syādityevaṃ deśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2313: ata eva paramārthato 'satyapi puṇyaskandhe saṃvṛtau sattvād bodhisattvena tatra vaśībhāvaṃ niṣpādayituṃ chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitam
T03kamvchtu:2315: kathaṃ na paramārthataḥ puṇyaskandhasattvaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicintya 'bodhisattvenātra kathaṃ pratipattavyam,
T03kamvchtu:2322: anena tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ prasthitena bodhisattvena paramārthatastadanupalambhena yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam
T03kamvchtu:2328: yadi puṇyaskandho naiva syāt tadā tathāgatānāṃ dvividhā kāyalakṣaṇasampad-anuvyañjanakāyasampad,
T03kamvchtu:2332: tasmāt tathāgatasya dvividhāṃ kāyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvairyatno
T03kamvchtu:2333: 'nuṣṭheya iti vicintayadbhyastathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2336: tato 'yamatrāryasubhūterāśayaḥ- yathā paramārthato 'skandha eva puṇyaskandhastathā rūpakāyo 'pyunutpanna eva /
T03kamvchtu:2337: ataḥ paramārthataḥ na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityucyate /
T03kamvchtu:2341: tasmād bodhisattvena māyānirmitabuddhasya tathāvidharūpādhimuktayā tatpratipattaye chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2343: pūrvamadhimukticaryābhūmau rūpakāyāptikāmatākāle tathāgatapūjāsatkārakāle ca tathāvidho 'bhiniveśaḥ parivarjitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2345: pariniṣpādayituṃ samprasthitasya bodhisattvasya rūpe 'bhiniveśo bhavatīti yāsāṃ prasiddhistāsāṃ pariṣadāṃ durvikalpo nirākṛta ityuktatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:2346: evaṃ tarhi tathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyaḥ kasmād deśita iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2348: na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityanena yojanīyam /
T03kamvchtu:2356: anena cāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam, (iti)
T03kamvchtu:2359: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ bodhisattvaiḥ karaṇīyānāṃ yatnānāṃ nidarśanena ādāryamapi dīpitam /
T03kamvchtu:2364: yadi rūpakāyapariniṣpattyāa na tathāgato draṣṭavya iti cet,
T03kamvchtu:2367: bodhisattavaistathāgatasya vāksampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ yatnaḥ karttavya iti vicintayadbhyo vāksampadamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha
T03kamvchtu:2368: paramārthato vācya-vācaka-vacanānāmabhāvāt na tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā dharmo deśita iti /
T03kamvchtu:2372: vacanāni karaṇarūpāṇi śabdasvabhāvābhāvātmakāni vā tathā vistareṇa prāgevoktāni /
T03kamvchtu:2380: kathaṃ tadabhūtamālapituṃ śakyata iti vicāraṇāyāmāha asatodgṛhītena iti /
T03kamvchtu:2382: anena tathāgatasya vāksampadi pravṛttena bodhisattvena pratiśrutkādivajjñātvā pravartitavyamiti,
T03kamvchtu:2385: pudgaladharmanairātmyadeśakena bhagavatā nānāpadavākyātmikeyaṃ dharmadeśanā kathaṃ prasidhyati?
T03kamvchtu:2390: bhaveyuriti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2395: sarvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat pūrvameva vistareṇa nirākṛtam /
T03kamvchtu:2398: sāmānyadravyatvābhyupagame svalakṣaṇa eva saṅgṛhītaṃ syāditi tanniṣedhena tasyāpi niṣedha eva /
T03kamvchtu:2399: anyavyāvṛttyā sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyāropitasvabhāvamiti parikalpite sati dharmadeśanāyā nairarthakyatvena siddhasādhanam /
T03kamvchtu:2401: paramārthataḥ svalakṣaṇasattve 'pi na yujyate tayā dharmadeśanā /
T03kamvchtu:2402: sphoṭādiśabdasya nityasvabhāvasya paraiḥ padatvena parikalpitasya kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ tāvad virudhyate,
T03kamvchtu:2405: anityasyāpi tāvat svalakṣaṇasva na yujyate padatvam,
T03kamvchtu:2407: na hi yujyate anyasya saṅketo 'nyasya ca vyavahāraḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2409: ata eva svalakṣaṇamapyabhidhātuṃ na yujyate, ananvayāt /
T03kamvchtu:2410: sāmānyapadārthe 'bhidheyatvenābhyupagate sati abhidheyasvabhāvatvena tasya svalakṣaṇasvarūpatvānna hi pradeśāntaragamanam /
T03kamvchtu:2411: ekatvaṃ tu deśakālādibhinnāsvanekavyaktiṣvanugatamapi na yujyate tathā hi- (atha)
T03kamvchtu:2412: ekasyāṃ vyaktau sarvātmanā vyāptaṃ syāt tadā yena ekatvena parikalpitaḥ sa svabhāvastena anyatrādhigatetaravyaktibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ taditarasvabhāvastatra na bhavediti,
T03kamvchtu:2415: evaṃ yāvatyo bhinnavyaktayastāsāmekadeśena vyāptivyavasthayā tāvatīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ syāttadā ekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇena yuktaṃ bhavet,
T03kamvchtu:2416: bhinnavyaktiṣu deśakālaparimāṇādibhinnāsu tāsvekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇād yugapudgrahaṇābhāva eva /
T03kamvchtu:2420: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
T03kamvchtu:2421: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā //
T03kamvchtu:2438: tatredānīmevaṃ gambhīradharmo 'yamanāgate kāle ghanībhūte kudṛṣṭijāle kathaṃ saphalo bhaviṣyatīti nābhiśraddhadhanti parivārāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2439: ya evaṃ cintayanti teṣāmaviśrambhaṃ nivārayitum āryasubhūtiścittasampatsu smṛtyupasthānamadhikṛtya bhagavan ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2440: bhagavatāpyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca bhaviṣyantīti kiṃ noktapūrvam /
T03kamvchtu:2441: samprati teṣāṃ sattve 'sattve vā ekāntenānabhiniveśaṃ deśayitum asti iti noktam,
T03kamvchtu:2443: paramārthataḥ skandhapudgalādīnāṃ satsvabhāvānupalambhāt na sattvāḥ ityanenādhyāropāntaniṣedhaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2445: bhaviṣyanti ityanayā deśanayā bhagavataḥ kīdṛgaviparītasmṛtyupasthānamiti sattvebhyo
T03kamvchtu:2450: yadi na te sattvāḥ syustadā kathaṃ bhagavatā 'bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca te';
T03kamvchtu:2461: yadi na syād bhagavataḥ kācidapi dharmadeśanā,
T03kamvchtu:2463: samyaksambuddho 'pi tatastathāgatābhisambodhisiddhaye vyarthaḥ syād bodhisattvānāṃ yatnaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2466: tebhyo 'bhisambodhim adhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2467: āryasubhūtiḥ pūrvābhiprāyaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti saḥ ityudatarat /
T03kamvchtu:2468: tadevaṃ manyate- paramārthābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmadeśanā pratiṣiddheti /
T03kamvchtu:2480: idānīṃ buddhabhūmiparyeṣaṇakāle pareṣāṃ tādṛgvikalpanirākaraṇānna bhavati punaruktidoṣaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2484: bhagavatā grāhyasvarūpasya svalakṣaṇasya sūkṣmo 'pi dharmasvabhāvo nopalabdhaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2493: sāmprataṃ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ api tu khalu punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2494: samāḥ sa dharmaḥ iti tadavabodhiteṣu sarvadharmeṣu pudgalanairātmyasāmyāt /
T03kamvchtu:2495: na tatra kiñcidviṣamam iti sarvatra tadaviparyayāt,
T03kamvchtu:2500: kena rūpeṇa samaḥ sa dharma ityatra niḥsattvatvena ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2501: anena sarveṇa kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2515: iti vicāryamāṇe mahārthadharmatayā prajñāpitatvena tatsattāṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte (Vajraṭ_204) ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2517: anantalokadhātūn ratnaiḥ paripūrya dānena yat puṇyaṃ tadapi upamāṃ naiva kṣamate /
T03kamvchtu:2518: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena sakalo mahāyānadharmaḥ parilakṣito bhavati /
T03kamvchtu:2519: yāvad iti vacanena sahasratamī kalā- 'śatasahasratamī kalā .......... upamā-aupamyamityetāni';
T03kamvchtu:2521: evaṃ mahārthadharmaprajñapanena hetunā bhagavataścittasampadaḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ānuttaryamavagamyate,
T03kamvchtu:2532: bhagavato lokottarajñānāvasthāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñā sarvathā na pravartate,
T03kamvchtu:2536: sattvādisaṃjñā na pravartata iti tannirdiśya avavādamahārthatvena prajñaptihetunā
T03kamvchtu:2538: pratipatsyamānāṃ darśayituṃ mahārthāvavādamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2539: praśnasyottaramapratīkṣamāṇaḥ sapadi svataḥ na khalu punaḥ subhūte,
T03kamvchtu:2541: tasmād bhagavataścittasampadastādṛśe mahārthāvavādahetau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2542: kiṃ sattvānāṃ sattve 'pi saṃkleśahetubhūtatayā tathā nābhipreyate tathāgatena?
T03kamvchtu:2543: āhosvit sattvābhāvāditi cintayatāmāśayaṃ vijñāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2545: skandhātmakasya pudgalātmakasya ca kasyacit sattvasya paramārthato 'bhāvād evaṃ nopalabhyata iti darśayitumāha- nāstiṃ kaścit sattvo yastathāgatena parimocittaḥ iti /
T03kamvchtu:2546: anena bodhisattvaiḥ kathamatra yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2547: abhāvaḥ kathaṃ jñātavya ityatra yadi punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2550: tasmād yadi sattvaḥ syāt tadā sandṛśyeta sa tathāgatena,
T03kamvchtu:2552: sa eva tāvattasya pragāḍhaḥ ātmagrāhaḥ syāt /
T03kamvchtu:2553: tataśca ātmagrāhahetutaḥ samutpannaṃ nikhilakleśajālabandhanamapyatidṛḍhaṃ syāt tadā rāgādyatipragāḍhabaddhasya āvaraṇāprahāṇena bhagavataḥ tathāgatapadaprāptirna syāt /
T03kamvchtu:2562: ātmādivastuna eva grahaṇaṃ syāttadā prahīṇāvaraṇasya tasya bhagavata (Vajraṭ_206)
T03kamvchtu:2569: pṛthagjanā api kecit sacchāstraṃ śrutvā yoniśomanaskārasthitāḥ dharmanairātmyādhimuktāḥ satyamabhiniviśante,
T03kamvchtu:2571: bālamātrakathanāt skandhādyabhijñā api tādṛśāḥ pṛthagjanā anupajātāryamārgatayā bālā eva /
T03kamvchtu:2572: bālānāṃ vaiśiṣṭayamabhidhātuṃ vyāvṛtte 'pyātmagrāhe bālatvena teṣvātmagrāha ityavabhāsate,
T03kamvchtu:2577: yadyātmā na syāttadā ke tāvat pṛthagjanā abhidhīyeran?
T03kamvchtu:2582: anena sarveṇa tāvat sākṣād gāmbhīryaṃ proktam /
T03kamvchtu:2589: tadabhāve mūlabhāvāt kathaṃ bhaveyuḥ tādṛyastathāgatakāyasampada iti?
T03kamvchtu:2592: tebhyo dharmakāyaparigrahamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2595: lakṣaṇasampadā tāvat paramārthavicāraṇāyāmavayavinaḥ paramāṇusaṃghātasya vā svabhāvenānupapattiṃ viditvā pūrvakamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇan subhūtirāha no hīdam /
T03kamvchtu:2596: evameva upapattyantaraṃ bhagavatā sacet punaḥ subhūte ityādinoktam /
T03kamvchtu:2597: yadi tathāgato lakṣaṇasampanmātreṇa prabhāvitaḥ syāt tadā vakṣyamāṇahetunā tulyatvād rājāpi cakravartī kathaṃ na bhavet tathāgataḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2600: tataḥ sa nocyate tathāgata ityapi na yujyate,
T03kamvchtu:2602: tena yadi tathāgato jaḍasvabhāvairlakṣaṇādidharmaiḥ prabhāvito 'bhaviṣyat tadā cakravartī api tathāgato 'bhaviṣyat iti cet?
T03kamvchtu:2603: na, tasmāttathāgastāvad aśeṣavastusvabhāvasya yathāvadadhigamamātreṇa prabhāvita ityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2604: anena tathāvidhaṃ jñānahetukaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ prati bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2607: bodhisattvena kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti dvābhyāṃ gāthābhyāṃ pradarśyate /
T03kamvchtu:2608: tatra pūrvagāthayā kathaṃ tathāgato na draṣṭavyaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2614: rūpeṇa cādrākṣuḥ ityanena rūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ pudgalāḥ pāramārthikalakṣaṇādibhiralaṅkṛtaṃ dharmarūpaṃ pudgalarūpaṃ ca paśyantīti vyavahāraprajñaptirnidiṣṭā
T03kamvchtu:2615: ghoṣeṇa cānvayuḥ iti māṃ śabdena evameva sa tathāgata iti jñātavanta ityarthaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2619: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtāste janāḥ tāvad vitathāmārgasthitatvānna māṃ samyag rūpeṇa drakṣyanti /
T03kamvchtu:2623: atha kathaṃ buddhā draṣṭavyā ityatra dharmataḥ ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2631: sarvatra tathābhāvāt 'tathatā tadālambanena sarve buddhadharmāḥ sambhavanti /
T03kamvchtu:2637: kimiti sā dharmatayā draṣṭavyetyatrāha- dharmakāyāḥ iti /
T03kamvchtu:2639: tenāyamarthaḥ- samyagjñānanibandhanā ye tathāgateṣu vyavasthāpitāste paramārthato dharmasvabhāvāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2644: anyathā kathaṃ tallakṣitāste draṣṭuṃ śakyanta iti vicārya dharmatā ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2645: kimaśakyatvād aparijñeyā athavā parijñāne doṣasadbhāvāditi vicintya na śakyā ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2647: yadā dharmisvabhāva eva kaścit paramārthato na siddhastadā kathaṃ sā dharmatāpi vijñātuṃ śakyate kevalayā svasantatyā /
T03kamvchtu:2649: yadyevaṃ samyagjñānasvabhāvānāṃ buddhanāmapi dharmiṇāṃ paramārthato 'siddhatvānna syād darśanam,
T03kamvchtu:2652: ye paramārthataḥ sarvadharmiṇo na paśyanti ta eva dharmatāṃ paśyanti /
T03kamvchtu:2658: asatyapi tathāgatasya lakṣaṇasampatsvabhāvatve yujyata eva lakṣaṇasampaddhetukaṃ tathāgatasyānuttarasamyaksambodhilakṣaṇam,
T03kamvchtu:2660: bodhisattvasya lakṣaṇasampadaṃ draṣṭvā bhagavān anuttarasamyaksambodhau vyākṛta iti (Vajraṭ_210)
T03kamvchtu:2663: yadi lakṣaṇasampad anuttarasamyaksambodherhetuḥ syāt tadā cakravartino 'pi syādityabhiprāyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2667: anena tāvat sakalena sthānena gāmbhīryaṃ darśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2668: saṃvṛtau cāśeṣavastusvabhāvādhimagalakṣaṇasya tathāgatajñānasya nirdeśena āudāryamapi nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2671: paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmabhāvād yadi sā dharmatā vijñātuṃ na śakyata iti cet tata ucchedavādī bhavān syāt /
T03kamvchtu:2672: tataśca tathāgatasyāpyabhāvād apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇamapi na sidhyatīti yadāśaṅkitaṃ
T03kamvchtu:2673: tadarthaṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ apratiṣṭhānamadhikṛtya subhūte ..... evaṃ ..... bodhisattvayānasamprasthitaiḥ ....... ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2681: sarve dharmo avicāraramaṇīyatayā yathābhūtaiḥ pratyayairutpadyamānā abhyupeyante,
T03kamvchtu:2682: ato bhagavatā buddhena tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvāyāḥ māhākaruṇāyā nirmāṇādau adhipatitvamādāya punarvineyebhyo yathāvadupāyopadarśanena (Vajraṭ_211)
T03kamvchtu:2685: tathāvidhe bhagavatkāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti tadapi nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2688: tadā saṃsartā eva bhavatīti vikalpya saṃsāre 'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2696: yathoktam : “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthgjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2703: sahetuke 'pi nityahetuko vā anityahetuko veti vikaladvayam /
T03kamvchtu:2706: nirapekṣasya sadasadavasthāsamatvena sarvatra nirviśiṣṭatvāt nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
T03kamvchtu:2708: nityasya itaraiḥ sahakāribhistāvanna kaścit sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ kriyate /
T03kamvchtu:2709: kutracidapyanapekṣaḥ san kimiva krameṇa kāryamutpādayenna yugapaditi /
T03kamvchtu:2717: taditarānyahetau cānabhīṣṭe kathaṃ na nirhetukaḥ syāt /
T03kamvchtu:2724: na tāvad yujyate tṛtīyapakṣo 'pi samānāsamānakālayoḥ kāraṇatvavirodhāt /
T03kamvchtu:2725: tathā hi, hetau sati sa phalena (kāryeṇa)
T03kamvchtu:2737: tatra taditarakālavyavadhānena phalotpāde sati vināśādevotpādaḥ abhyupagamyeta,
T03kamvchtu:2739: anyathā akārakasya vinaṣṭavastuno vināśāt kathaṃ (utpādaḥ) bhavet /
T03kamvchtu:2740: avyavadhāneneti pakṣe 'pi yadi sarvātmanā avyabahitastadā tadeva samakālatvaṃ syāt /
T03kamvchtu:2741: niravayavayordvayorvastunoḥ sarvātmanā avyavahitatve ekakālatvātiriktā nānyā gatiḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2742: tasmāt sarvātmanā avyavahite sati pūrvaṃ yathā aṇumātrakam (iti prasaktam)
T03kamvchtu:2745: ataḥ paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā anutpannā eva /
T03kamvchtu:2749: 'kāryakāraṇayorāgopālaṃ prasiddhatvānna yujyate vimarśaḥ iti vādaḥ kathaṃ yujyeta,
T03kamvchtu:2752: na cakṣu pramāṇaṃ na śrotragrāṇaṃ na jihvā pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /
T03kamvchtu:2753: pramāṇaṃ yadyeta bhaveyurindriyāḥ kasyāryamārgeṇa bhavet kāryam //
T03kamvchtu:2754: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jadā svabhāvena avyākṛtaśca /
T03kamvchtu:2755: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva ārthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu kāryam //
T03kamvchtu:2760: ato bhagavatā śālistambādiṣu bhāvānāṃ svaparodayo niṣiddhaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2769: sva eva yadā nāsti paro hetuḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
T03kamvchtu:2777: anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāptatvāt mahājñānālokodayā labdhānuttarapuṇyaskandhā bodhisattvāḥ kathaṃ saṃsāraduḥkham anubhaveyurityevamāveditam
T03kamvchtu:2782: tatrānutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiprāptyā bodhisattveṣu nāstyubhayavidho duḥkhahetuḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2788: kathaṃ vā bahutarapuṇyaskandhotpādamātreṇa saṃsāre 'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sandarśitamityāśaṅkya punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2789: anena tāvad utpannapuṇyaskandhe 'pi teṣāṃ mithyābhiniveśena puṇyaskandhaparigrahasya sarvasaṃkleśamūlaviparyāsasyāprahīṇatvam, ataḥ (te)
T03kamvchtu:2791: bodhisattvānāṃ tu anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpteḥ puṇyaskandheṣu nāsti satyābhiniveśaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2794: tadayamāśayaḥ- tattatsūtreṣu bhagavatā 'bodhisattvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ parigṛhṇāti'; ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:2795: atra na parigrahītavyaḥ iti vacanena kathaṃ na virodha iti?
T03kamvchtu:2796: bhagavānapi yenābhiprāyeṇoktavān tadubhayamapi darśayitumāha- parigrahītavyaḥ iti /
T03kamvchtu:2797: parigrahīta iti yadāha tattu parigrahalakṣaṇanaya upasaṃhāralakṣaṇaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2802: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prārabhya audāryamuktam,
T03kamvchtu:2804: etena sakalena sthānena śāśvatocchedāntaṃ parihṛtya madhyamamārgo deśitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2814: tadā bhagavataścaturīryāpathena janmābhiniṣkramaṇādinā cāgamaprasiddhena kathaṃ na
T03kamvchtu:2815: virodha iti yo manyate tadarthaṃ prasthānasampada īryāpathena prasthitimadhikṛtya
T03kamvchtu:2816: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścid ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2817: gacchati vā āgacchati vā ityetaddvayena caṅkramaṇam,
T03kamvchtu:2820: bhagavata āgamena paridīpitānāmīryāpathādīnāṃ yaḥ samyaktayā śabdaśo 'bhiniveśastāsya viparītābhiniveśānna jānāti tathāgatena bhāṣitasyārtham
T03kamvchtu:2828: tasmād evaṃvidhāyāṃ īryāpathaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti sandarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2830: kathaṃ tathāgataḥ iti gatyā prabhāvita ivocyata iti cittāśayaṃ vitarkyāha- tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
T03kamvchtu:2831: na me sa bhāṣitasyārthamājānāti ityanena yojanīyam /
T03kamvchtu:2834: api tu adhigamena prabhāvitaḥ gataḥ ityasyādhigatyarthatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:2841: tacca gamanādi kvacit saṃvṛtāvapi na sambhavati,
T03kamvchtu:2845: tataḥ sa vastusvabhāvādhigatyā samastalokasya jyeṣṭhatvāt pūjanīyatvāt arhan ityucyate,
T03kamvchtu:2847: anyathātvena jaḍasvabhāvena rūpakāyastu tathā nocyata iti bhāvaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2850: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya nirmāṇakāyamāśritya anantalokadhātuṣu apratihatagamanādipradarśanena ādāryamapi pradarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2854: tasyāpi ekānekasvabhāvavisaṃyogānmāyānirmitabuddhavat mṛṣātvaṃ darśayituṃ bhājanasattvalokabhāvavigamāt prasthitimadhikṛtya yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2858: tadyathāpi nāma maṣiṃ kuryāt....... paramāṇusañcayaḥ ityanena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogāvagamena tanukaraṇopāyo darśitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2864: saced bhagavan iti vijñaya ekatvagrāhakanivṛttyupāyārthameva paramāṇuprabhedena (yaḥ)
T03kamvchtu:2865: sañcayaḥ sa ukto na tu paramārthato 'navasthitatvāt,
T03kamvchtu:2867: tasmāt na bhagavānavakṣyat paramāṇusañcaya iti abhāṣite 'pyevamākhyātatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:2868: anena tathāgatasya rūpābhāvatvena tādṛśyāṃ sthitau chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2870: api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet?
T03kamvchtu:2871: iti kasmād bhagavānavakṣyadityāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:2872: asañcayaḥ saḥ iti pūrvottarādidigbhāgabhedena avasthitānāṃ teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ svabhāvenāsiddhatvānna yujyate tattvataḥ sañcayaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2875: asati ca digbhāgabhede paramāṇavaḥ paramāṇvantaraiḥ pūrvāparordhvādhodigbhāgabhedena parivṛtā na syuḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2877: bhāga eva bhavati paramāṇurityapi kathanaṃ na yujyate,
T03kamvchtu:2880: aniṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svabhāvena tarhi tvayā kiṃ sādhyate?
T03kamvchtu:2886: ye paramāṇavastvayā niravayavatvena vyavasthāpyante teṣāṃ pūrvottarādidigbhedābhyupetatvāt digbhāgabhedenābhyupagamyante,
T03kamvchtu:2893: na rūpe naiva netre ca tayormadhye 'pi na sthitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2894: yatra sthito bhavettatra na sannaiva hi cāpyasat //
T03kamvchtu:2897: bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ityanenaudāryaṃ cābhihitam,
T03kamvchtu:2900: samprati sattvalokābhāvaprasthitimadhikṛtya bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti saḥ ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2903: ata eva adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ iti pañcaskandhātmakaḥ sa sattvaloko 'pyekānekasvabhāvavirahitaḥ pūrvavaduktaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2904: anena tathāgatasya tathāvidhāyāṃ sattvalokābhāvaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2905: nirābhāsena tu yogasamāpattiriyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyetyapi sandarśitam /
T03kamvchtu:2906: idānīṃ cittaṃ kathaṃ pragrahītavyamiti darśayituṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2911: yadi sattvaloko yathāprasiddhastathā paramārthataḥ syāt sthūlaikasvabhāvastadā tathāgatena yathāsthiti vastutattvamadhigatamiti sa eva (Vajraṭ_221)
T03kamvchtu:2914: sa eva ca tathāgatasya piṇḍagrāho 'tigāḍhataraḥ syāt,
T03kamvchtu:2916: na tvevam, ata evānyatra yo bālajanebhyaḥ piṇḍagrāha ātmagrāhasya hetutvena bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ sa paramārthato 'grāhya eva /
T03kamvchtu:2922: vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti paramārthe 'bhāvāt sa dharmastvanabhilāpya ityuktavān /
T03kamvchtu:2923: yadyevaṃ grāhyaḥ piṇḍo na syāt tadā tatra grāhakasyāpyabhāvāt kathaṃ vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti vicintyāha- sa ca bālapṛthajanairudgṛhītaḥ iti
T03kamvchtu:2928: anyathā yathāvastu vyavahāraprajñaptau kathaṃ te bālāḥ syuḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2931: anena yadā sarve bhāvāḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvaśūnyāstadā rūpakāyaḥ jñānakāyaśca kathaṃ bhavet paramārthataḥ sasvabhāvaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2933: samprati yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādinā sarvasthāneṣu yogasamāpatteḥ kenopāyena sarvatra samādheyamiti tat pradarśyate /
T03kamvchtu:2934: evamanusandhiḥ- yadi nāsti piṇḍagrāhastadā tanmūlaprabhavāyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevābhāvāt kathaṃ bhagavān pañcasu dṛṣṭiṣu satkāyadṛṣṭimāheti tadarthaṃ yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2941: tatra yo hi kaścit subhūte ityārabhya tenocyate ātmadṛṣṭiḥ etatparyantamanena kathamavikalpyaṃ taduddiṣṭam /
T03kamvchtu:2944: bhagavatā tu pudgalanairātmyapratipādanādātmaniṣedhārthamāha ātmadṛṣṭiḥ iti tasyāḥ ātmadṛṣṭernirākaraṇena dharmanairātmyaṃ vyavasthāpyate adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityuktam /
T03kamvchtu:2948: evaṃ hi subhūtea bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena ityanena yo 'vikalpakaḥ sa paridīpyate /
T03kamvchtu:2950: jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ ityanena yenāvikalpyaṃ tadabhihitam /
T03kamvchtu:2961: yathā na pratyupasthāmahe ityanena yo 'vikalpastaṃ darśayati /
T03kamvchtu:2962: asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityatra hetuḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:2973: tatra yadi nāsti dharmasaṃjñā tadā tathāgatasya sattvebhyo taddharmadeśanāsaṃjñāsamutpāde kathaṃ na bhavet saṃkleśaḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2974: kṛpayā sattvārthaṃ yāvatsaṃsārāvasthāne sati dharmasaṃjñayā kathaṃ na syāt saṃkleśaḥ?
T03kamvchtu:2975: iti vicintya tayaiva cittasampadā deśanāsaṃkleśaṃ gāthayā ca saṃsārākleśamāvedayitum yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
T03kamvchtu:2983: anena yamānmahārtho 'yaṃ dharmastasmādbodhisattvenaivaṃvidhāyāṃ mahārthadharmadeśanāyāmavaśyameva chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyaṃ tatparidīpitam
T03kamvchtu:2984: bhāṣyamāṇāyāmapi kathaṃ na syātsaṃkleśa ityetaddarśayituṃ kathaṃ na samprakāśayet ityāha /
T03kamvchtu:2987: evamuktam- yathā vineyajanāstathā sarve dharmā ādito 'nutpannatvādanabhilāpyāḥ (Vajraṭ_224)
T03kamvchtu:2988: tasmānna te kenāpi vyapadeśyā ityevaṃ darśyata iti /
T03kamvchtu:2992: ata eva tathāgato dharmadeśanākāle viśuddhalokajñāne prasthitaḥ,
T03kamvchtu:2998: sāmprataṃ nikhilaprajñāpāramitākāyaṃ vyavasthāpya gāthayā saṃsārāsaṃkleśo deśyate /
T03kamvchtu:3004: tatra pañcaskandhātmakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yathāpratīti pratītyasamutpādastāvad hetupratyayasaṃgṛhitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ ityucyate /
T03kamvchtu:3005: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ tārakāḥ iva draṣṭavyaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:3008: tathaiva saṃskṛtā api avidyājñānāndhakāre sati pratibhāsante,
T03kamvchtu:3012: vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ ca karmavartikaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehaṃ cāśritya prajvalanād dāpa iva draṣṭavyam,
T03kamvchtu:3022: yā kācid vedanā seha duḥkhamiti bhāṣitatvāt /
T03kamvchtu:3023: trividhaiḥ dukhaiḥ sarvā vedanā duḥkhā veditavyā /
T03kamvchtu:3041: tatra ye tāvadatītāste smṛtimātrāvasthitā ato niḥsvabhāvatvena,
T03kamvchtu:3044: pratyupannā vidyudaupamyena ekānekasvabhāvarahitāḥ agrāhyasvabhāvatvaditi tenānvitā vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
T03kamvchtu:3046: abhraupamyena ākāśasamacitte tadbījadauṣṭhulyena janitatvāditi nairātmyadvayaṃ tāvaddeśitam /
T03kamvchtu:3047: ato 'nena khalu samagreṇātra bodhisattvaiḥ sadā sarvasaṃskṛtasvabhāvamevaṃ vicārya chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti paridīpitam /
T03kamvchtu:3050: gāthāyāmasyāṃ tāvadidaṃ paridīpyate- saṃkleśamulaṃ tāvad viparyāsaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:3051: ataḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāveṣvanekaśaḥ kenacid vicārayatā manasikurvatā apyevaṃ saṃskāraparijñānādyadā viparyāsābhāvāt na bhavati saṃkleśaṃ (tadā)
T03kamvchtu:3061: kartuṃ loke sukhaṃ śāntau bhave cāpyanadhiṣṭhitaḥ /
T03kamvchtu:3063: traiyadhvikānāṃ jananī munīnāṃ khyātā yathāśakti mayā tato jagat /
T03kamvchtu:3064: vipulena puṇyena viyatsamena vidhūya cāndhyaṃ sugatatvamāpnuyāt //
T03kamvchtu:3065: ācāryakamalaśīlena mādhyamikanayena viracitā vistṛtā āryavajracchedikāṭīkā parisamāptā /
T03kamvchtu:3066: aṣṭamyāṃ śatābdyāṃ bhāratīyācārya mañjuśrīmitreṇa bhota-locāvā yeśe-demahābhāgena ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāmanūditā /
T03kamvchtu:3067: viduṣāṃ vaśaṃvadena ācāryapemātenajinamahādayena bhoṭabhāṣātaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ punaruddhṛtā sarvasattvahitasukhārtham iti /
